member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadExpressionEditorExtensions.TryParse(Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadExpressionEditor,System.String,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression@)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of an expression to its equivalent. A return value indicates whether the conversion was successful.
member.param: The instance which will perform the conversion.
A string containing a well-formed expression to convert.

When this method returns, contains the LINQ Expression equivalent to the well-formed expression contained in , if the conversion succeeded, or null if it failed. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if was converted successfully; otherwise, false.
